# Python bytecode
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Distribution / packaging
dist/
build/
*.egg-info/
*.egg

# Virtual environments
venv/
env/
ENV/
.env/
.venv/
env.bak/
venv.bak/

# IDE specific files
.idea/
.vscode/
*.swp
*.swo
*~
.DS_Store

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints

# Coverage reports
htmlcov/
.coverage
.coverage.*
coverage.xml
*.cover
.pytest_cache/

# Documentation build
docs/_build/
docs/html/
docs/doctrees/

# Generated files
*.png
*.csv
*.log

# Cache directories
.pytest_cache/
.mypy_cache/

# OS specific
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini
